course_title: Core in Mind, Brain and Culture
class_notes: Permission of the instructor is required to enroll.
course_description: A comprehensive introduction to the history and philosophy of science as it applies to the social, psychological, and brain sciences, an overview of different types of disciplinary and methodological approaches to the study of mind, brain, and culture (augmented by occasional guest lectures by CMBC faculty affiliates from the various disciplines), and an examination of particular questions or problems and discussion of how different approaches from different levels of analysis converge to provide synthesis and insights not readily gleaned by examining a single disciplinary perspective.
